title: Motocross tracks
name: Motocross tracks
description:
A Map by Czuk

Motocross tracks i have raced on.

properties.description: Posted by Cat4larry

properties.name: Aonia Pass
properties.description: Posted by Czuk1.7-mile long natural/man-made motocross course. There are several doubles and tabletops, a rhythm section, and a few single jumps. The track is hard-packed. Passing is not a problem as the track is 25-40\' wide all around. There is also a fun supercross track, woods trails, and a peewee track. This race is a qualifier for lorreta lynn series.

properties.name: Big Cedar MX Track
properties.description: Posted by CzukMile and a quarter 25-30 foot wide track, singles, doubles, double doubles, double triples, 65-70 ft. tabletops, step-up tabletop, 70 ft. double, whoops, rhythm section, off camber turns, banked turns. Combination of topsoil, sand, and red clay.

properties.name: Bremen Race Park
properties.description: Posted by Czuk Groomed, watered, with lights. "Track is always changing with technical jumps for the novice & expert. The track has rolling terrain & loads of saw dust for killer berms. Races run year round as does practice."

properties.name: Calhoun Supercross
properties.description: Posted by CzukThe dirt has lots of saw dust and good ole\' Georgia clay with a mixture of sand added to make for a good racing surface, excellent bermed turns, plowed and tilled straights, some small and some long jumps. This track I have probility race the most at in my life. I started racing here when I was around 5 and raced on it last year.

properties.name: Diamondback
properties.description: Posted by CzukThis track name is Diamondback. Roughly 2 miles long. I have raced here a few times. Best place I got was 2ed.

properties.name: Five Oaks Motocross
properties.description: Posted by CzukA motocross track closes to my home in Chattanooga. I raced my first race here. Very small track that only one man owned.

properties.name: Lorreta Lynn Ranch
properties.description: Posted by CzukThis race is located at the Lorreta Lynn Ranch. This is the biggest race in the nation for amateurs. Every pro has raced this race. Every amateur dream about race. This race only happens once a year and you have to race all over to quality for this race. Every qualifier race has 40 riders. They take the top 7 to move on to the next qualifier that has 40 people in it. If you manage to make it to the race it says a lot. Think of this race like arena football or minor league baseball. I’ve been to this race twice. The first time I wreck both on both my heat races and got 23rd out of 40 racers. The second time I had an overall of 17th overall. I had to race all over the East side of America over 8 mouth period just to qualify to race this race.

properties.name: Meadow Creek
properties.description: Posted by Czuk1431 Taylor chapel rd Crossville, Bike Concrete gate, Dubbed the fastest track around-groomed with semi truck loads of sawdust and water, natural uphill and down hill grade

properties.name: Monroe
properties.description: Posted by Cat4larry Monroe, GA

properties.name: Muddy Creek
properties.description: Posted by CzukThis track is named Muddy Creek. A local qualifier for lorreta lynn. They call it Muddy Creek because it always seems to rain right before a big race, and becomes very muddy.

properties.name: Panther Creek MX
properties.description: Posted by Czuk

properties.name: Thunder Valley
properties.description: Posted by CzukA small easy track. Great track to start racing on.

properties.name: helen
properties.description: Posted by Cat4larry helen, ga
